headline: Equity Residential to Participate in Bank of America 2025 Global Real Estate Conference
summary: CHICAGO, September 08, 2025--Equity Residential (NYSE: EQR) today announced that the Company’s President and CEO, Mark J. Parrell, will participate in a roundtable discussion at the Bank of America 2025 Global Real Estate Conference on Wednesday, September 10, 2025 at 2:45 PM CT. The event will be web cast live. A link to the web cast will be available in the Presentations section of the Investor section of the Company’s website at www.equityapartments.com. On September 2, 2025, the Company issu
